Text: Software Connections Volume February Palms Software Connections brought to you by InSync Online Dear Jess Welcome to our second funfilled issuewith a couple of businessoriented apps to keep you on your toes Oh the games people play on their Palms Bejeweled is a real gem among the fun fastpaced and otherwise totally addicting And Scrabble loyalists gather round Handmark has just the thing for a rainy afternoon or a few minutes in between client calls If you want more fun for your buck check out PopCap Games Pack by Astraware Eventually you will have to get back to work When you do tap open Documents to Go Professional to edit Word PowerPoint Excel on your handheld Too many todos to keep track of Tell BugMe to bug you If you dont see anything below that grabs you click on through to the Palm Software Connection at udikfxLXecKTY Its packed with new titles that are super easy to find Check out our user reviews while youre at it See you next time The InSync Online Team FEATURED SOFTWARE APP WORLDMATE A World of Good Three continents four cities five days Youve been in so many time zones you cant figure out if this is Tuesday or Belgium And if you could only catch a few zzzs before you head down to change your yen into lira or is it drachma Travelers put down your troubles Worldmate is here to serve Whether youre on business or pleasure going to one city or around the world WorldMate will handle your timetelling and currency conversions Itll even help you pick out the right size sweater for your Uncle Alberts th Got to get to an early morning meeting Set the Worldmate alarm and then hit snooze Even better Worldmate lets you compare four customizable world clocks to your home time It also comes with an interactive currency converter clothing converter and measurement converter for distances lengths and temperatures plus other lifesaving features Try it Now udEfxLXecKS MOST POPULAR APPS BEJEWELED Betwitched bewildered Bejeweled From relaxed and easy to fiendishly challenging Bejeweled has a game and pace to suit your mood Tap pairs of gems to swap them and make matching horizontal and vertical lines of three or more Amazingly simple and almost impossible to put down this one could land you in Games Anonymous Try it Now udEfxLXecKTS HANDMARK SCRABBLEr In a word cool Thats what its like to play the worlds most popular word game on your Palm handheld Scouts honor the Handmark SCRABBLEr Game plays just like the classic board game It features draganddrop tile placement plus a builtin Official Scrabble Players Dictionary to settle those inevitable spelling squabbles It automatically scores every game and saves partially completed games to be picked up later Try it Now udqEfxLXecKTX POPCAP GAMES PACK BY ASTRAWARE Pick a pack of PopCap five great games in one fun package Bejeweled Mummy Maze Seven Seas Alchemy and Atomica Swap gems to make lines in the fiendishly addictive Bejeweled Escape to the exit and outwit the mummy in Mummy Maze and Navigate your galleon through hazardous waters avoiding pirates reefs and even sea monsters in Seven Seas Try it Now udmkfxLXecKTM TOP TWO APPS Documents To Go Pro New Charts Pics More Behind on work Time to get down to business Documents To Gor Professional Edition puts Microsoft Word Excel PowerPoint and other files on your Palmtm handheld Edit letters memos projects sales presentations next quarters budgetwhatever where and when you want This latest version has new and improved chart picture and other capabilities Try it now udhEfxLXecKTB BugMe You forgot to pick up the dry cleaning then the quart of milk you promised to bring home And that was after forgetting your assistants birthday Turn your life over to the care of BugMe This ingeniously simple note taker and memory jolter
